name: Roll-A-Diction
description:
The goal is to roll the letter dice to create words.

-select the die with your cursor, then use WASD or the arrow keys to move them into position to make a word. Build longer words with higher scoring letters for more points, the more points your word has, the more stars you finish the level with. When satisfied with your word click "finish" to complete the level.

- Placing one of your dice on the "X2" on the board will make the stone dice have the same letter as the dice placed next to it.

-The stone die doesn't move!

-Placing any one of your dice on the "+1" marker on the game board will cause the letter after that die's value in the alphabet to appear on the stone die. eg. placing an "S" on the "+1" marker will create a "T" on the stone die.

Create your best words by rolling the dice around the screen
